verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> time, while he was yet shut <S%H6113>up<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H6213>maker<s%> thereof, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H3335>formed<s%> it, to <S%H3559>establish<s%> it; the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>; the LORD is: or, JEHOVAH, etc
<S%H7121>Call<s%> unto me, and I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> thee, and <S%H5046>shew<s%> thee <S%H1419>great<s%> and mighty <S%H1219>things<s%>, which thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> not. mighty: or, hidden

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, concerning the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and concerning the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which are thrown <S%H5422>down<s%> by the <S%H5550>mounts<s%>, and by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>;

They <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, but it is to <S%H4390>fill<s%> them with the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, whom I have <S%H5221>slain<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and in my <S%H2534>fury<s%>, and for all whose <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> I have <S%H5641>hid<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from this <S%H5892>city<s%>.

Behold, I will <S%H5927>bring<s%> it <S%H724>health<s%> and <S%H4832>cure<s%>, and I will <S%H7495>cure<s%> them, and will <S%H1540>reveal<s%> unto them the <S%H6283>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%>.

And I will cause the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%>, and will <S%H1129>build<s%> them, as at the <S%H7223>first<s%>.

And I will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them from all their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, whereby they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against me; and I will <S%H5545>pardon<s%> all their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, whereby they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and whereby they have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me.

And it shall be to me a <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H8342>joy<s%>, a <S%H8416>praise<s%> and an <S%H8597>honour<s%> before all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, which shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> all the <S%H2896>good<s%> that I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them: and they shall <S%H6342>fear<s%> and <S%H7264>tremble<s%> for all the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> and for all the <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> that I <S%H6213>procure<s%> unto it.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Again there shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>, which ye <S%H559>say<s%> shall be <S%H2720>desolate<s%> without <S%H120>man<s%> and without <S%H929>beast<s%>, even in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that are <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, without <S%H120>man<s%>, and without <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>, and without <S%H929>beast<s%>,

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>joy<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3034>Praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>; for his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: and of them that shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the sacrifice of <S%H8426>praise<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. For I will cause to <S%H7725>return<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, as at the <S%H7223>first<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; Again in this <S%H4725>place<s%>, which is <S%H2720>desolate<s%> without <S%H120>man<s%> and without <S%H929>beast<s%>, and in all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof, shall be an <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> causing their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> to lie <S%H7257>down<s%>.

In the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H8219>vale<s%>, and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%>, and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and in the places <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, shall the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> pass <S%H5674>again<s%> under the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of him that <S%H4487>telleth<s%> them, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Behold, the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that I will <S%H6965>perform<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> which I have <S%H1696>promised<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

In those <S%H3117>days<s%>, and at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, will I cause the <S%H6780>Branch<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to grow <S%H6779>up<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>; and he shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

In those <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H3063>Judah<s%> be <S%H3467>saved<s%>, and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>: and this is the name wherewith she shall be <S%H7121>called<s%>, The LORD our <S%H3072>righteousness<s%>. The LORD: Heb. Jehovahtsidkenu

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; <S%H1732>David<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; David: Heb. There shall not be cut off from David

Neither shall the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and to <S%H6999>kindle<s%> meat <S%H4503>offerings<s%>, and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H3117>continually<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; If ye can <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%>, and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%>, and that there should not be <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> in their <S%H6256>season<s%>;

Then may also my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> be <S%H6565>broken<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that he should not have a <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> upon his <S%H3678>throne<s%>; and with the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, my <S%H8334>ministers<s%>.

As the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> cannot be <S%H5608>numbered<s%>, neither the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H4058>measured<s%>: so will I <S%H7235>multiply<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto me.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H7200>Considerest<s%> thou not what this <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4940>families<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%>, he hath even cast them <S%H3988>off<s%>? thus they have <S%H5006>despised<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they should be no more a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; If my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> be not with <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>, and if I have not <S%H7760>appointed<s%> the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>;

<S%H1571>Then<s%> will I cast <S%H3988>away<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, so that I will not <S%H3947>take<s%> any of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> to be <S%H4910>rulers<s%> over the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H3446>Isaac<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: for I will cause their <S%H7622>captivity<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H7725><s%>, and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on them.
